results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits IL-5-Induced Chemotaxis and CCR3 Expression of HL-60-Derived and Human Primary Eosinophils
results.text_hl: We confirmed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ also reduced eosinophilic infiltration in @<m>DISEASE_Rhinitis_Allergic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065631 @@@allergic rhinitis@@@.
